name: Knyctos
description:
Set in the medieval European landscape, our protagonist is entangled in the plot the Cult of Knyctos has put into motion. You must survive the journey battling creatures of darkness. Light is your friend as creatures and the land become increasingly dangerous as the darkness takes hold.

Knyctos the demon that absorbs the light and life from the land you love.

Do not let fear overtake you.

Do not give into the well placed fear of the dark.

Nyctophobia, is not just a feeling,

its alive

and hungry.

Please download the game and let us know what you think. Please keep in mind that this is a work in progress and is still very rough around the edges.
